tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable stays and versatile event spaces.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Please fill out the form below to book your dormitory.
fillFormToBookFacility: Please fill out the form below to book the selected facility.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
anySpecialRequests: Enter any special requests or notes here (optional)
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired date range to see available dormitories.
errorFetchingDormitories: Could not fetch dormitories. Please try again later.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Could not fetch halls/sections. Please try again later.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed. Please proceed with payment as instructed.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
enterContactPersonName: Enter the name of the contact person
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval. You will be notified via email once your account is reviewed.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try another one or login.
searchBookings: Search bookings by ID, name, company...
viewAndManageActiveBookings: View and manage currently active or upcoming bookings.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This may affect existing bookings.
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
viewAndManageHallsAndSections: View and manage all halls and sections.
noDormitoriesFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add some to get started.
noHallsMatchSearch: No halls or sections match your search.
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add some.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Error fetching dormitory details. Please try again.
noDormitoryIdProvided: No dormitory ID was provided in the request.
invalidDormitoryId: The provided dormitory ID is invalid.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: {roomNumber} is currently marked as unavailable by the administration and cannot be booked.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to view this page.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently pending approval by our administration team. You will be notified via email once it's reviewed. You can view available facilities, but booking will be enabled after approval.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has not been approved at this time. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
statusUnknownMessage: We could not determine the current status of your account. Please contact support.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support for further assistance.
yourActiveBookingsDescription: View and manage your company's active or upcoming facility bookings.
noActiveBookingsFound: You have no active or upcoming bookings.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Could not fetch your bookings. Please try again later.
noBookingsMatchSearch: No bookings match your search criteria.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, email...
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and manage company registration requests.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Admin or Superadmin users.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account. This user will have administrative privileges.
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin user {email} has been successfully registered.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Superadmin users.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for payment verification via Telegram.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for payment verification via Telegram (optional).
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking request has been received. Please complete the payment via bank transfer and send proof to our Telegram bot for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your booking request! It will be reviewed by our team, and you will be notified of the approval status. Payment instructions will be provided upon approval.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: After making the payment, please send a screenshot or proof of payment to our Telegram bot @OROTRAIN. Include your Booking ID: {bookingId} in the message for faster verification.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Could not load complete booking confirmation details. Please check your email or contact support.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not currently expected for this booking or it has already been processed.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your booking payment.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the bank transfer, please send your payment proof (e.g., screenshot) to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. Make sure to include your Booking ID and the phone number used for booking ({phoneNumber}) in your message for quick verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our team will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory bookings using your phone number.
enterPhoneNumberPrompt: Enter your phone number used for booking
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active or upcoming approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for bookings. Please try again.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
noActiveBookingsFoundAdmin: No active bookings found at this time. New bookings will appear here.
noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match the current filters.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or not yet ready for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom agreement terms here. These will override the default terms.
editTermsNote: Note: These terms will be part of the generated agreement. Ensure they are legally sound.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon booking confirmation unless otherwise agreed in writing.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the booking start date are non-refundable. Cancellations made 7-14 days prior are subject to a 50% fee. Cancellations made more than 14 days prior will receive a full refund.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Damages: The client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by their attendees or representatives during the booking period.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Use of Facility: The client agrees to use the facility only for the purposes stated in the booking and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. The provider reserves the right to terminate the agreement immediately if these terms are breached.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet available for viewing. It may be pending administrative action or not applicable.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to Cloudinary. Please try again or contact support.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: The signed agreement has been uploaded and the booking status updated.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: An error occurred while uploading the agreement. Please ensure the file is a PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, or PNG and try again.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to see available dormitories.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories are available for the selected date range. Please try different dates.
noDormitoriesConfigured: No dormitories are currently configured by the administrator.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type and ensure a date range is chosen above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print specific dormitory booking data for selected periods.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected range.
registerKeyholderDescription: Create an account for a keyholder staff member.
keyholderRegisteredMessage: Keyholder user {email} has been successfully registered.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyKeyholderPage: This page is accessible only by Admin or Superadmin users.
searchByNamePhoneId: Search by guest name, phone, or Booking ID...
noBookingsMatchKeyholderSearch: No paid dormitory bookings match your search.
noPaidDormBookingsForKeyAssignment: There are no active, paid dormitory bookings requiring key assignment at this moment.
manageKeyAssignmentsForGuests: Manage key issuance and return for guests with paid dormitory bookings.
errorFetchingDormBookingsForKeyholder: Failed to fetch dormitory bookings for key assignment.
keyholderOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Keyholder users.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Payment proof submission is handled via Telegram.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: The selected dormitory does not have a valid capacity configured.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, '{roomName}' does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: '{itemName}' is currently marked as unavailable by the administration and cannot be booked.
itemUnavailableConflict: Sorry, '{itemName}' is already booked or pending for some or all of the selected dates.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again.
selectDateAndFilterFacility: Select your desired date range and optionally filter by facility type to see available options. You can then select multiple items to book together.
selectDateRangeFirstTooltip: Please select a date range to enable booking multiple items.
selectItemsFirstTooltip: Please select one or more items from the list to book.
bookSelectedItemsTooltip: Book all currently selected items for the chosen date range.
pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Please select a date range to enable booking multiple items.
noFacilitiesAvailableInDateRange: No halls or sections are available for the selected date range and filter. Please try different dates or adjust filters.
noItemsCurrentlyMatchFilters: No items currently match your selected filters and date range.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: To select and book multiple facilities together, please log in as an approved company representative.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Your company account is pending approval. Booking will be enabled once approved.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select one or more items to book.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: The item '{itemName}' is currently not available and was removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item '{itemName}' could not be found in our records.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: Error fetching details for '{itemName}'. It has been removed from selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking. Please go back and select facilities.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: Please fill out the form below to book the selected facilities.
noValidItemsForBooking: No valid items were found to proceed with the booking. Please try selecting again.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is pending approval. Multi-item booking will be enabled once your account is approved.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-maintained dormitories for students and trainees, offering a conducive environment for learning and rest.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and configurable sections perfect for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options, including lunch and refreshments, to complement your events.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is dedicated to providing top-notch accommodation and event facilities. We strive to offer a seamless experience for all our guests and clients, ensuring comfort, convenience, and quality service. Our center is equipped to handle various needs, from individual stays to large corporate events.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: And many more amenities designed for your comfort and convenience.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: High standards of cleanliness and maintenance.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: Explore our offerings and make your booking through our easy-to-use online platform or contact us for more information.
brochureSubtitle: Your trusted partner for accommodation and event space rentals in Oromia.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us with any questions or for booking assistance.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory buildings:
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, facility bookings, or general information:
workingHoursNote: Our office hours are {hours}. We look forward to assisting you.
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your smartphone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Get quick access to our services overview.
addLedProjectorDescription: Include an LED projector for sections that support this option (additional cost applies per section, per day).
